Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1930 W. RIO SALADO PARKWAY, TEMPE, Arizona, 85281, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Carvana Co is an e-commerce platform for buying and selling used cars. The company derives revenue from used vehicle sales, wholesale vehicle sales and other sales and revenues. The other sales and revenues include sales of loans originated and sold in securitization transactions or to financing partners, commissions received on VSCs and sales of GAP waiver coverage.
